data.text:
I salari vanno aumentati senza pesare sulle imprese: quella è la nostra priorità. La filosofia è quella degli #80euro: l'abbassamento di tasse deve vedersi subito in busta paga. E dovremmo rilanciare sulla redistribuzione degli utili aziendali e sul #salariominimo.
#RenziRep 9/9

Conte è un enigma indecifrabile: cambia le proprie idee a seconda dell'interlocutore che ha davanti, dicendo tutto e il contrario di tutto. Sta ridefinendo il concetto filosofico di #ipocrisia. Quanto ai 5S, sono in un cul de sac.
#RenziRep 8/9

The midday broadcast offers the same type of behind-the-scenes information, news and celebrity interviews that viewers have come to expect from "E! The hosts lead what the network calls "fun, insightful and relatable conversations" revolving around the day's biggest pop-culture stories.

The midday broadcast offers the same type of behind-the-scenes information, news and celebrity interviews that viewers have come to expect from "E! The midday broadcast offers the same type of behind-the-scenes information, news and celebrity interviews that viewers have come to expect from "E! News" but also adds other elements typical of morning shows. The hosts lead what the network calls "fun, insightful and relatable conversations" revolving around the day's biggest pop-culture stories.

entity.description: George R.R. Martin's best-selling book series `A Song of Ice and Fire' is brought to the screen as HBO sinks its considerable storytelling teeth into the medieval fantasy epic. It's the depiction of two powerful families - kings and queens, knights and renegades, liars and honest men - playing a deadly game for control of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, and to sit atop the Iron Throne. Martin is credited as a co-executive producer and one of the writers for the series, which was filmed in Northern Ireland and Malta.

entity.name: E! News
entity.description: "E! News" has been a staple of the cable network's evening lineup for years, and now the franchise is expanding to earlier in the day with "Daily Pop." The midday broadcast offers the same type of behind-the-scenes information, news and celebrity interviews that viewers have come to expect from "E! News" but also adds other elements typical of morning shows. The hosts lead what the network calls "fun, insightful and relatable conversations" revolving around the day's biggest pop-culture stories.

The midday broadcast offers the same type of behind-the-scenes information, news and celebrity interviews that viewers have come to expect from ``E! News'' but also adds other elements typical of morning shows. Hosts Justin Sylvester and Carissa Culiner lead what the network calls ``fun, insightful and relatable conversations'' revolving around the day's biggest pop-culture stories.

entity.description: "E! News" has been a staple of the cable network's evening lineup for years, and now the franchise is expanding to earlier in the day with "Daily Pop." The midday broadcast offers the same type of behind-the-scenes information, news and celebrity interviews that viewers have come to expect from "E! The hosts lead what the network calls "fun, insightful and relatable conversations" revolving around the day's biggest pop-culture stories.

entity.name: E! News
entity.description: "E! News" has been a staple of the cable network's evening lineup for years, and now the franchise is expanding to earlier in the day with "Daily Pop." The midday broadcast offers the same type of behind-the-scenes information, news and celebrity interviews that viewers have come to expect from "E! News" but also adds other elements typical of morning shows. The hosts lead what the network calls "fun, insightful and relatable conversations" revolving around the day's biggest pop-culture stories.

entity.description: "E! News" has been a staple of the cable network's evening lineup for years, and now the franchise is expanding to earlier in the day with "Daily Pop." The midday broadcast offers the same type of behind-the-scenes information, news and celebrity interviews that viewers have come to expect from "E! News" but also adds other elements typical of morning shows. The hosts lead what the network calls "fun, insightful and relatable conversations" revolving around the day's biggest pop-culture stories.

8 "Perché attacchi il PD?"
È il PD che attacca me accusandomi di tutto. La verità è che il PD ha scelto di votare per mantenere la Legge Bonafede anziché ritornare alla Legge Orlando. E in quel passaggio ha perso la sua patente di garantista, la sua anima di riformismo
#Enews

entity.name: Sunday Brunch
entity.description: Presenters Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer mix a cookery show with a chat show, and the result is `Sunday Brunch.' Each installment finds Simon and Tim cooking in the kitchen, accompanied by that week's celebrity guests. Other segments include interviews and highlights from television and film, an expert who assists with drink tasting, a round-up of what is trendy, and the ever-popular `Sunday Brunch Playlist,' which consists of music videos chosen by the presenters and their guests. Guests have included Stacey Solomon, Lisa Faulkner, Tara Reid, Rufus Wainwright and Marina Diamandis.
